name: 科尔内利乌斯·格兰特
name_full: 科尔内利乌斯·格兰特 Cornelius Grant
introduction: Cornelius Grant is a Jamaican actor whose work includes film, music videos, webisodes and theatre. He is a radio and television host for shows on Hype TV and for Radio Jamaica's Cross Country Invasion He is the owner of the entertainment company, Good Vybz Entertainment and was an award-winning Director in the Caribbean Film Emerge competition.
